trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around October 10th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving east on Anderson lane to meet a friend when I noticed a bright point of green light in the sky traveling in a straight line at a steady pace from south to north. I assumed it was an aircraft at cruising altitude, but there were no flashing lights as I would expect(and I'm not familiar with intense green lights on a plane). Also, while not moving at blazing speed, it was much faster than aircraft I've seen, covering several degrees of the sky in about ten seconds. I then lost my view of it through my windshield as it was far above my car. Within thirty seconds I had pulled into a parking lot, got out to find it again, but it was gone. When I got home several hours later, I googled "green light in sky", found several similar sightings, but no explanations.
Summary: Bright green light travelling across sky
